meanings.definition: Not requiring much effort or attention.
meanings.sent1: The nondemanding task was easy to complete.
meanings.sent2: She preferred a nondemanding job that allowed her to relax.
meanings.sent3: The cat chose the nondemanding option of sleeping all day.
meanings.sent4: His nondemanding schedule was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The nondemanding puzzle was perfect for beginners.

meanings.definition: Not placing a burden or obligation on someone.
meanings.sent1: The nondemanding request was simple to fulfill.
meanings.sent2: He appreciated her nondemanding attitude towards their friendship.
meanings.sent3: The nondemanding invitation to the party made him smile.
meanings.sent4: Her nondemanding nature was like a gentle breeze in his life.
meanings.sent5: The nondemanding favor was a pleasant surprise.
